thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Voya Financial Announces Fourth-Quarter And Full-Year 2017 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Voya Financial Announces Fourth-Quarter And Full-Year 2017 Results
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Voya Financial Inc:
* VOYA FINANCIAL ANNOUNCES FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.87 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $17.64 * BOARD OF DIRECTORS AUTHORIZES AN ADDITIONAL $500 MILLION OF SHARE REPURCHASES
* TOTAL AUM AND ADMINISTRATION OF $555 BILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017
* QTRLY RESULTS INCLUDE ESTIMATED ONE-TIME $3.78 PER DILUTED SHARE LOSS CHARGE RELATED TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
